title: Chargrilled vegetable, halloumi and chickpea salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', 'salt and pepper', '1 red pepper, cut into thin strips', '2 small courgettes, sliced into thin ribbons', '2 bunches asparagus, trimmed', '200g halloumi cheese, thinly sliced', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'lemon wedges, to serve']
